author: Jennifer Hansler, CNN
title: Trump contradicts Pompeo by downplaying foreign coronavirus disinformation campaigns
description: President Donald Trump on Monday expressed skepticism about foreign disinformation campaigns related to the coronavirus pandemic, contradicting Secretary of State Mike Pompeo who has been a strong critic of China and Iran in particular.
content:
Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump on Monday expressed skepticism about foreign disinformation campaigns related to the coronavirus pandemic, contradicting Secretary of State Mike Pompeo who has been a strong critic of China and Iran in particular.
